body.name: PQRQP 3 in 1 Wireless Lavalier Microphones for iPhone, iPad, Android, Camera, USB-C Microphone, 7-Hour Battery, Mini Microphone with Noise Reduction for Video Recording, Vlog, YouTube, TikTok
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 25 mins
features: Universal Wireless System: Wireless microphone is completely cable-free, delivering a stable audio signal up to 65 feet. You can hold it by hand or clip it on your shirt. With the dual wireless microphone, it is possible to record the voices of multiple people simultaneously. It is a convenient feature for those who need to capture high-quality audio on multiple devices at the same time, whether you're recording a podcast, giving a presentation, or conducting an interview.

Full Compatibility: The upgraded wireless microphone comes with a 3 in 1 universal receiver, eliminating the need to replace multiple individual interfaces or interface cables. Compatible with android smartphones, iphone(including iPhone 15), iPad, laptops, personal computers, camera etc. Mini microphone is suitable for blogging, interviewing, live streaming, blogging, podcasting, youtube, instagram, TikTok.

Smart Noise Cancellation: Our dual wireless microphone is equipped with professional-grade intelligent noise reduction chips and high density spray-proof sponge that helps to cuts off any noise interference and improve audio quality,record every detail of the sound clearly regardless of the surroundings. The omni-directional iphone microphone gives best clear timbre.

Rechargeable Transmitter and Receiver : PQRQP wireless lavalier microphone built-in large capacity rechargeable battery and low power chip, provide more than 7 hours of battery life. Furthermore, this microphone for iPhone also supports charging while recording. With type-C charging cable, the receiver and the phone can be charged at the same time.

Easy Automatic Connection：Wireless microphone is easier to set up. Plug and play, no adapter, Bluetooth or app required, simply plug the receiver(Lightning/TYPE-C/3.5mm port) into your device . and turn on the portable microphone and the two parts will pair automatically. (Note: Bluetooth wireless microphone , if the match is not successful, don't worry, just shut down the device and try again)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased a lavalier wireless microphone and I am absolutely blown away by its performance! I would highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a top-quality microphone that provides excellent sound quality and versatility.Firstly, the setup was incredibly easy and straightforward. The wireless connectivity is flawless, and I never experienced any interference or connectivity issues during use. The microphone also has an impressive range, which means I can move around freely without worrying about losing the connection.The sound quality is simply outstanding - it is clear, crisp and free from any unwanted background noise or distortion. Whether I'm using it for public speaking, recording videos, or live performances, the microphone consistently delivers excellent audio quality.I also appreciate the convenience of the lavalier design, which allows me to clip the microphone discreetly onto my clothing for hands-free use. This is especially useful during presentations or performances, as I can move around and gesture freely without any interruptions.Overall, I would highly recommend this lavalier wireless microphone to anyone in need of a high-quality microphone for their professional or personal use. Its exceptional sound quality, ease of use, and versatility make it an excellent investment for anyone looking to take their audio recording or public speaking to the next level. I give it a five-star rating without hesitation!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: very good product. clear sound well connected. it’s so convenient to connect to my phone and laptop and even my camera. nice! the sound is so clear and it’s cheap affordable. I recommend my friends to buy it for youtuber!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick Connectivity & Great Sound
reviews.reviewText: As a video creator, one of the most important things for me is sound quality, ease of use and connectivity. This wireless microphone set is great because it comes with two microphones and one receiver. The receiver has multiple connections for different types of mobile devices. In the past, I had to buy separate kits every time I updated my phone. With this set you can connect to older iPhones as well as new ones. The wireless connection happens automatically and sound quality is perfect. I highly recommend these to any novice video creators to professional video creators. A+

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Plug and Play
reviews.reviewText: Ease of use, receiver was attached and readily picked up by my phone, mic's worked great as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, works on Android and iPhone, great quality
reviews.reviewText: These mics work really well. I use them for video recording on both iPhones and Android phones, and I have had no issues with with. Very easy to use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Blocks both USB ports on laptop, therefore I can't do the external HDMI display I need to do
reviews.reviewText: This product is a total bust for me. I wanted it as my microphone while teaching a course, where my laptop is recording the screen session and also displaying to the large screen in the lecture hall as an external monitor. But this microphone's receiver uses one of the two USB C ports on my Macbook, and physically blocks the other USB C port from being used at all, so I cannot record a session while also using an external monitor, which is the only thing I wanted to do with this. The microphone receiver does NOT work in the Macbook headphone jack, nor does it work when attached to a short USB C extension cable (which I tried because this eliminates the physical blockage of the port where I want to attach to the external monitor).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits a variety of devices.
reviews.reviewText: This product, though having some different kinks, worked well. I loved that I could connect it to various different devices such as my computer and camera, as well as the cancellation of background noise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheap with good quality
reviews.reviewText: I needed these for a live stream I was doing. These seemed quick and cheap to do the trick. I was surprised how well it sounded, and the battery life is pretty decent given how small they are. I got about 6 hours out of a single mic. Will probably buy more!
Do not buy- the receiver light does not turn on.
